location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of a service telegram from the Foreign Secretary, Calcutta to Sir Lewis Pelly, Baroda

mods.abstract: Telegram stating that if the Gaekwar's defence attempt to introduce any correspondence relating to Colonel Robert Phayre's dismissal from Sind Andrew Scoble should object using reasons given in previous telegrams, but that if they do produce copies of any papers and require originals for the Commission the Government would supply them.
